title: [PS2] Shadow Man 2econd Coming [NTSC] [USA] [DVD-Convert]
description:
Published by: Acclaim Entertainment
Developed by: Acclaim Studios Teeside
Genre: Third-Person Action Adventure
Number of Players: 1
Release Date:
US: February 28, 2002
Europe: March 8, 2002


Featuring an all-new game engine that was designed, developed and delivered exclusively for the PlayStation 2,  Shadow Man: 2econd Coming follows Mike LeRoi and his Deadside alter ego Shadow Man as they battle Grigori, a group of sadistic demons that have been masquerading as humans for the last 2000 years. Features include more than 30 hours of gameplay told through scripted and dynamic cinematics, multiple routes, and in-game transitions from day to night, real-time weather effects such as snow and rain, six seamlessly connected environments and sub-locations, and a rule-based artificial intelligence that allows enemies to realistically respond to various situations and events.
